achievements: Pioneer of Japanese technopop and city pop music
Produced hits for numerous J-Pop artists including Seiko Matsuda and Namie Amuro
Founded the successful record label Being Inc.
Character designer for the Final Fantasy series, particularly known for Cloud Strife and Sephiroth
Directed numerous popular video games including Kingdom Hearts and The World Ends with You
Known for his distinctive art style and complex narratives
Former IWGP Heavyweight Champion and Intercontinental Champion in New Japan Pro-Wrestling
Known for his charismatic personality and unique wrestling style
